SEARCH
Package src.game.map

Class PathNode

java.lang.Object
src.game.map.PathNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PathNode extends Object implements Serializable
A class to represent a PathNode in a Network, each PathNode is associated with exactly two CityNodes Can be serialized for game saving
Author:
devinlinux
See Also:

    • fread

      public static List<PathNode> fread(String path)
      Library (static) method to load PathNodes from a file # means a comment Should be written in the form name::cityname1::cityid1::cityletter1::citygood1::cityname2::cityid2::cityletter2::citygood2::type file form (no comments)
      Parameters:
      path - the path to the file with the edges
      Returns:
      a list of PathNodes loaded from path
